title: 你的钱用于照看动物。
answer: Your money pays to look after the animals.

title: 但我对去卧龙大熊猫自然保护区看大熊猫更感兴趣,因为那里允许人们更近距离地接触它们。
answer: But l am more interested to see the pandasin the Wolong Panda Reserve, because it allows people to get closer to them.

title: 想起大熊猫和其他濒危动物来，真让人伤心。
answer: lt's sad to think of pandas and other animals in danger.

title: 几乎没有大熊猫幼崽出生在动物园外面。
answer: Very few baby pandas are born outside Zoos.

title: 动物园要求我们不要喂动物。
answer: The zoo asks us not to feed the animals.

title: 我们应该努力阻止人们捕杀老虎。
answer: We should work hard to stop people killing tigers.

title: 为了保护野生大熊猫，政府正在建立自然公园，并制订其他计划。
answer: In order to protect pandas in the wild, the government is setting up nature parks and developing other plans.

title: 自然公园将会很大，也会有更多的竹子来喂养大熊猫。
answer: The nature parks will be big and there will be more bamboo to feed the pandas.
